DefaultEvent.Description: Leathery meat and handfuls of coins from a dozen harbours.
DefaultEvent.Name: Bare pickings

RareDefaultEvent.Description: Leathery meat and handfuls of coins from a dozen harbours. But what's this? A battered pewter tankard, marked with the stamp of the Blind Helmsman at Wolfstack Docks. An old, treasured, possession.
RareDefaultEvent.Name: Odd pickings

ChildBranches.Name: Loot the bodies
ChildBranches.Description: How many times have they looted fallen enemies? Now it's your turn.

DefaultEvent.Description: They may not know much, but they know how to fight dirty. Take a note. You may need it some day.
DefaultEvent.Name: Ugly customers, ugly methods

ChildBranches.Name: Record any Observations
ChildBranches.Description: If you've gathered at least 10 Observations, you may learn something...

Description: They're as unlovely in death as they were in life.
Name: Fallen Corsairs
